snippet: The government, and insurance companies, are scrambling to reassure Medicare beneficiaries that they are unaffected by the rollout of the federal health exchange.
abstract: Government officials, and insurance companies, are scrambling to reassure Medicare beneficiaries that they are unaffected by the rollout of the federal health exchange.
lead_paragraph: The government, and insurance companies, are scrambling to reassure Medicare beneficiaries that they are unaffected by the rollout of the federal health exchange.

headline.main: Beneficiaries of Medicare Left Confused by Exchanges
headline.print_headline: Beneficiaries Of Medicare Left Confused By Exchanges
